CapitationCareFeeAgreement.name: CapitationCareFeeAgreement
CapitationCareFeeAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Capitation Care Fee Agreement type.

ContractPaymentAgreementId.description: The contract payment agreement record to which this capitation care fee agreement is associated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MemberAgeRangeLowerLimit.description: The lower age limit of the enrolled member for the capitation care fee agreement.

MemberAgeRangeUpperLimit.description: The upper age limit of the enrolled member for the capitation care fee agreement.

MonthlyBalanceFee.description: The balance fee for each member after the monthly withheld fee.

MonthlyFee.description: The fee agreed upon by the provider and payer for each member per month.

MonthlyWithheldPercentage.description: The percentage of the monthly fee that's withheld by the payer and shared later with the provider based on the performance.

Name.description: The name of the capitation care fee agreement.
